name: m3u8-hls-player-with-custom-keyboard-shortcuts
displayName: M3U8-HLS Player with Custom Keyboard Shortcuts

scripts.publish:chrome: npm run build:chrome && node build_scripts/publish.js chrome-webstore
scripts.publish:firefox: npm run build:firefox && node build_scripts/publish.js firefox
scripts.publish:edge: npm run build:chrome && node build_scripts/publish.js edge
scripts.build: node build_scripts/build-icons.js && npm run download-deps && npm run copy && npm run minify
scripts.build:chrome: npm run build && node build_scripts/build-platform.js chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build && node build_scripts/build-platform.js firefox
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.release:minify: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.release:obfuscate: npm run obsfuscate && npm run zip
scripts.minify: npx terser npm/player-utils.js npm/player-drm.js npm/player.js npm/shortcuts.js -c sequences=true,dead_code=true,conditionals=true,booleans=true,unused=true,if_return=true,join_vars=true,drop_console=true -m toplevel=true -o js/player.min.js
